metadata.title: CVE-2019-20923 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which throw unhandled Javascriptexceptions containing types intended to be scoped to the Javascriptengine's internals. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0versions prior to 4.0.7.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
